price: هغوى وويل: قسم په الله چې خامخا الله پر موږ غوره كړى يې او بې شكه چې موږ خطا كاران وو.
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ لَقَدۡ ءَاثَرَكَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَإِن كُنَّا لَخَٰطِـِٔينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi laqad ātharaka al-lahu ʿalaynā wa-in kunnā lakhāṭiīna
